text: Hey all, I feel like this might be the best place for this question, but I am struggling to get two CSS files in the design manager to minify automatically. As of right now, there are 0 errors or warnings on both files (though I did fix warnings that did exist), but despite my best efforts, they are still failing to minify on page load. Has anyone experienced this and possibly know of a fix?

I have found the fix and I thought I'd share as well in case anyone runs into this issue. Turns out that some process over on HubSpot's side was caching the old version of the CSS file that had errors in it. I had to rename the CSS file to something else other than its previous filename, then the file minified.
